bioconda.name: bioconductor-watermelon
bioconda.summary: Illumina DNA methylation array normalization and metrics

biotools.summary: The package makes it convenient to use data quality metrics and normalization methods for Illumina 450 methylation array. The functions also use minfi, methylumi and IMA packages.

bioschemas.name: wateRmelon
bioschemas.summary: The package makes it convenient to use data quality metrics and normalization methods for Illumina 450 methylation array. The functions also use minfi, methylumi and IMA packages.
